short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to reduce your online spending and secure your financial future.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SpendBlock, a Chrome Extension, lets you block checkout pages for financial control. You can choose either a soft block with encouragement and reminders of the value of your financial freedom. Or you can choose a hard block to eliminate your temptation to spend completely. You can also turn it off at anytime.

Unlike generic blockers, SpendBlock focuses solely on Checkout pages. This is useful for platforms like Amazon where controlling purchases matters, while enjoying Prime Video, Thursday Night Football, Audible, and more remains unaffected!
